did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle: Papers of John Bannister Tabb, n.d.
did.physdesc: This holding consists of a single item, AMS, 1 p.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of John Bannister Tabb, Accession # 6899-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased on April 2, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This holding is composed of two verses with religious subjects, each consisting of four lines, entitled "Tradition" and "At Cock Crow" by John Bannister Tabb, the Virginia poet and Roman Catholic priest.
